data.name: Welcome to Chornobayivka VR
data.detailed_description:
You play as Joe Beggart on his duty to protect the Ukraine against the zombie Russian invaders in full immersive VR. A soldier trained heavily for combat situations. He thought it would be a normal day but his day is soon turning into a living nightmare. You begin your journey to save the Ukraine in Bucha. "Welcome to Chornobayivka VR" is a unique wave like horror VR shooter experience with free locomotion. Choose your weapon because now is the time to defend your checkpoint against the Russian invaders!

In this version you can play the first map of the game and choose between 3 weapons. We plan to ad more maps and weapons for free to the game at a later date.

At that day the Russians start a miss planned attack against the Ukraine, Joe grabs his preferred weapon to stop the zombie Russian soldiers that got infected by a sick experiment of Putin.

Joe is the son of John Beggart, our hero of Dark Invasion VR: Doomsday, John trained Joe in every aspect to survive such a situation way before Joe joined the army.

- Full immersive VR

- Blood and gore

- Free locomotion

- 3D sound

- Wave like shooter experience

- More free content gets added soon

- Compatible to almost every VR headset

- Free to play

- Please donate to Ukrainie ðŸ’™ðŸ’›

-"Welcome to Chornobayivka VR" is a free to play spinoff of the "Dark Invasion VR" series

In memory of every fallen person of the current war situation in the Ukraine. Russia turned against the world and brainwashed the Russian people, that is why we created the intruders in this game as Zombies that are able to steal toilets, flat screens and more.

Joe starts his fight against the Russian invaders in Bucha, we plan to extend the battle in some updates around the legendary battlefields of Chornobayivka airport and Azovstal.

data.short_description: At that day the Russians start a miss planed attack against the Ukraine, Joe grabs his preferred weapon to stop the Zombie Russian Soldiers that got infected by a sick experiment of Putin. Fight for democracy and freedom in a wave like horror VR shooter experience for free.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
